title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: Greetings my fellow Naija people, I was in my room this evening thinking about d founder of BTC which is anonymous till date because, we all knew that someone dat has such knowledge to create BTC to reduced unemployment and eliminated delay in transaction in the whole world, show dat such man or woman is the richest in d whole world, if dey want to rate such person. If I discovered dat my father is d founder of BTC, I will first ask him to show me his Bitcointalk.orgaccount Â password to confirm and other BTC document dat guarantee him as d founder of BTC, so dat when he fulfill his destiny and pass away from dis earth, I will now have full evidence as d next of kids to his personal identify as founder of BTC because, what belong to my father Belong to me. What will you do when you find yourself in such favourable condition? Â Will you expose him now for d whole world to know dat your father is d founder of BTC? Or you will keep d secret as anonymous till him leave dis earth before you can prove it to d whole world? Your opinion is highly welcome.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on May 12, 2023, 03:18:54 PMWhat will you do when you discover that the founder of BTC is your father?Being aware that the BTC developer is your father means that there are great possibilities that they can use you as bait to find Satoshi. So cute, that thought (lol). But first, if you discover that Satoshi is your father, I know some people will, out of excitement, whisper to their best friend that Satoshi is "my dad," and that your best friend will whisper it to another friend who will whisper it to the government (lol). Well, I don't just like how I feel imagining that BTC's founder is my dad. So I don't really have any cool answers for this. But I must say, I really love the idea of this thread. OP, if you don't mind, you can edit the topic and add "For Fun." Let's see some funny replies.
